title: Stock
description: Track stocks, manage your watchlist, and build your portfolio.

watchlist.title: Watchlist
watchlist.description: Monitor your favorite stocks and their real-time performance.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: Manage your holdings and track your investment performance.

toolbox.title: Analyzer Toolbox
toolbox.description: Calculate key financial metrics for stock analysis.

analyzer.title: Analyzer
analyzer.description: Analyze stocks using the Cold Eye investment methodology.

logbook.title: Analysis Logbook
logbook.description: Record and review your stock analysis history.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Configure scoring thresholds and analysis parameters.

guide.title: Investment Guide
guide.description: Learn the Cold Eye philosophy and investment strategies.

diary.title: Diary
diary.description: Record your investment thoughts and market observations.

dy.title: Dividend Yield
dy.desc: The unit of Price and Dividend needs to be the same (dollar/cent)

pe.title: PE Ratio
pe.desc: The unit of P/E and EPS needs to be the same (dollar/cent)

peg.title: Zulu Principle (PEG ≤ 1.0)
peg.desc: Check if PEG ratio meets Zulu Principle (PEG ≤ 1.0)

peDiscount.title: Historical PE Discount
peDiscount.desc: Compare current PE to historical average for safety margin
